channel.title: Help with droping for green dragon
channel.description:
#Green Dragons 941:1000 536:1
i know that 941=is the monster drop 1000= the ratio 536=is the item id 1=is how amny but when i compile and restart the sever it still does not drop? and does the ratio need to be higher or lower? :confused:

item.title: Help with droping for green dragon
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

1000 means out of every 1000 times it dies you get the drop.
Lower it if you want the drop more often, raise it or keep it the same if you donâ€™t.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with droping for green dragon
